content:
Share a crush, an unpopular opinion, or a secret 🙂
For a mental health concern, or if you just want someone to talk to, text hello to 741741 or call 1-800-273-8255. You’re not alone. ❤️
Submission page: https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSf6O0HQahSHmjy0uYge2PdEuFR-4mKF1yDMfCW2OZI2g93kow/viewform
If you have a question about courses/academics, try this group: https://www.facebook.com/groups/613050602225880/
Opinions expressed therein are the personal opinions of the original authors, not of Gunn Confessions. Additionally, some confessions may be untrue.

9632. [2021] I'm confused and don't know what's happening anymore and at this point I've committed too many war crimes against neutral merchant vessels to ask
#GunnConfessions9632

9631. If the closure continues past the end of school, then would seniors have to come back next year to turn in their textbooks? And if the closure miraculously does end before the school year ends, would there be a finals week?
#GunnConfessions9631

9630. [2020] How do I find my purpose in life? I feel like I am living a pointless life without direction.
#GunnConfessions9630

9629. Anyone have advice on treating skin hyperpigmentation? I have really bad psoriasis and when treat it, I get dark spots where it used to be. I don't want to go to the hospital during this time so I'm looking for over the counter treatments
#GunnConfessions9629

9628. [2021] Wait I’m confused...is all that’s going to show up on our transcripts this semester a credit/no credit?? Do our letter grades just go out the window??
#GunnConfessions9628

9627. did anyone get into cosmos UC San Diego?
#GunnConfessions9627

9626. [2021] Which seniors got into Stanford and ivies??
#GunnConfessions9626

9625. What results in "no credit" in the credit/no credit grading system PAUSD is implementing?
#GunnConfessions9625

9624. [NA] Hi this is Sara Tabin, a reporter at the Palo Alto Daily Post. I would love to hear how you are feeling about the school district's switch to online learning and credit/no credit grades. If you want to send me an email or set up a phone call my email address is sara@padailypost.com. Hope you are all safe and healthy!
#GunnConfessions9624

9623. [2021] RIP anyone who worked hard during January and February and got their grades to a place that would raise their GPA just for this pass/fail thing to be implemented
#GunnConfessions9623

9622. [2023] Hi everyone! Please support this petition urging Los Angeles County to switch to a Pass/Fail grading system pioneered by Palo Alto Unified School District.
https://www.change.org/PassFailGrades
#GunnConfessions9622

9621. @9160
It depends on what you mean by similar to One Punch Man: character diversity, action, that one OP main character that crushes everyone, etc.
Thus this list may or may not contain anime you dislike. I’ll also be including other genres for anyone else interested :)
For the sake of non being repetitive, I’m not going to mention the big ones, like Black Clover, My Hero Academia, Naruto, One Piece, Bleach, Demon Slayer, etc. Those have probably been mentioned as some point or another.
If you want a summary of any of these anime, go to My Anime List and look them up.
With that being said, anime list!
Overlord — this one’s kinda similar to One Punch Man in the sense that it’s a satire of OP characters. It also just generally has really interesting and unique characters.
Genre: Action, Comedy, Isekai, Fantasy
That Time I Got Reincarnated as a Slime — also has a diversity of characters and an OP main character. And his slime form is really cute.
Genre: Action, Comedy, Fantasy, Isekai
Assassination Classroom — less about action and a lot more about how classmates interact with each other and their teachers. Even still, Koro-Sensei is really OP and so is Nagisa to some extent.
Genre: Comedy, Action, School
Akatsuki no Yona (Yona of the Dawn) — it’s an action... with a female lead! This one’s another one of my favorites, and I highly recommend watching this one.
Genre: Historic, Adventure, Action
Now some romance ones:
Love is War — really cute. Highly recommend. Everyone is so loveable in this anime, even that one guy that’s gloomy all the time. It’s basically one giant satire of romance (pay attention to the narrator).
Genre: Romance, School, Comedy
Your Lie in April — a nice romance complete with music! Character development is really apparent and fun to see. Also the music is really good :P
Genre: Music, Romance, School, Drama
Acchi Kocchi — personally, I really love this one. Everyone is super cute, and there’s not much drama involved: it’s basically purely warm and fuzzy moments.
Genre: Romance, Comedy, Slice of Life
I’ll do some more later if more people want it haha.
[#GunnConfessions9610]
#GunnConfessions9621

9620. [2021] pass/fail literally sucks and I think we really need to band together and talk to the Gunn admin because there ARE better solutions. Please hear me out; foothill and most other colleges have a similar system to what we are doing now except they have options, students can choose to have pass/fail or receive an actual letter grade when taking a course and we should have the same system and let students choose. Pass:fail should still be an option because some people need it, if they can’t complete as much work because their family is sick or etc... but for the rest of us, having this semester of grades matters and we would rather not have pass/fail.
it works for about half of Gunn students, aka the seniors who are chilling in second semester and don’t need grades, and the freshman who’s grades don’t even matter for UCs. For the rest of us, it’s a whole semester of grades that can boost your GPA missing; especially those of us who were counting on having this semester to boost it and chose our courses based on this fact.
For sophomores, now they have to get great grades in junior year when they will be taking APS and much harder classes because they don’t have the cushion of sophomore year grades to back them up. This is extremely unfair because they will suffer much more stress in junior year, when the majority are taking the SAT, starting to think about college, and have difficult classes.
For juniors, this was their last chance to boost their GPA and get good grades and that’s been unfairly taken away from them. The hard classes you took that would have affected your weighted GPA now do not and you basically took it for nothing. A whole semester is gone from the grade book.
Some may say that ‘a semester doesn’t make a difference’ and ‘colleges will overlook it’ but it puts us at a great a disadvantage compared to other students from other schools who are NOT doing pass/fail, (and the majority are not) and will have these grades when they are applying for college.
Lets step it up and convince the admin or at least do something.
#GunnConfessions9620

9619. Quarantine has made me feel peaceful for once. My mental health has improved a lot
#GunnConfessions9619

9618. So.... this years college acceptances might have been the worst yet. Apparently UCLA had a 7% acceptance rate.
#GunnConfessions9618

9617. I have no one to talk to besides my family and my dad is kind of toxic to talk to. So I try to avoid talking to him that much. My brother is good too but my dad forces him to do online classes for hours.
#GunnConfessions9617

9616. [2020] ivy day makes me sad :(
filler filler
#GunnConfessions9616

9615. [2023] In the free time I’ve had during quarantine, I’ve been working on this science project and I’m happy to report that it is finally complete! I’ve successfully TURNED MYSELF INTO A PICKLE! HAHAHAHAHAHAHHAHAHAHAHHA
#GunnConfessions9615

9614. seniors please post cool places u got into so we can be proud of y'all (like the opposite of wall of rejections but wall of acceptances)!!
#GunnConfessions9614

9613. I’m starting to feel very lonely and sad and now I don’t have any non scary feel good things to watch on Netflix I don’t know what to do
#GunnConfessions9613

9612. [2021] is anyone else doing literally no work at all or is that just me
#GunnConfessions9612

9611. [2022] Ok I can definitely see how this pass/fail messes with a lot of people. I’m not sure if there was a better choice in my opinion. I definitely think that this sucks for people who had just worked themselves into a really good-looking place for the first quarter, but this corona would likely cause mass grade deflation. A lack of structured curriculum, test preparation, and varying circumstances with home life means that grades would be very unlikely to go up, but rather more likely to go down. Also, aren’t a couple of colleges also going to look past this semester? What do you all think?
#GunnConfessions9611

9610. Does anyone have anime recommendations? Preferably similar to One Punch Man but really anything will do? Big thx
#GunnConfessions9610

9609. So are our grades pass/fail now?? Words words wolekwek
#GunnConfessions9609

9608. The clouds these days are really just so pretty
#GunnConfessions9608

9607. I was in a relationship with a boy for over four months and he refused to let anyone know because he was afraid of how it would look. He promised me that he cared about me more than just my body, but that he just didn't want to upset his friends and parents. He recently made out with another girl, and told the exact same people that he refused to let me tell for fear of it being "leaked." He's pursuing a relationship with her, and everyone is allowed to know. And it makes me feel like shit because not only am I no longer good enough for him, she's so much more enough that he's okay letting everyone know about her and not me. I wish someone would care about me the way he cares about her. I wish someone would be proud to be dating me.
#GunnConfessions9607

Share a crush, an unpopular opinion, or a secret 🙂
For a mental health concern, or if you just want someone to talk to, text hello to 741741 or call 1-800-273-8255. You’re not alone. ❤️

9604. For Students looking to use the Adobe Apps at home. They will need to visit the page below and login using their PAUSD credentials. (Click on School/Organization Account) Once they have logged in they will be directed to the page that allows the students to download and install the Apps on their personal computers.
https://creativecloud.adobe.com/apps/all/desktop
#GunnConfessions9604
